title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-3.1 - Permit requirements

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-3.1 - Permit requirements

State Regulations
(a) Except
as provided in section
380-3.5
of this Part, persons
subject to this Part must obtain a permit before: (1)
emitting radioactive material to the
air; (2)
discharging radioactive
material to a water of the State as defined in ECL Article 17, Title
1; (3)
incinerating radioactive
material; (4)
disposing of
radioactive material in the environment; or
(5)
using radioactive material in the
environment in a manner that results in the release of radioactive material to
the environment. (b) Persons who obtain a permit may only release, use, or dispose of the
radioactive material as prescribed by that permit. Notes
